$comment: Pinned baseline + tighter platform constraints to avoid common Windows/VS vcpkg build breaks (UWP/MinGW/Xbox/static CRT). FreeType is now opt-in to avoid brittle GitLab source downloads in CI.
name: colony-game
description: Windows-only colony sim / engine dependencies via vcpkg (DX11/DX12 toolchain, UI, profiling).

dependencies.$comment: DXC tool used at build time (shader compilation). Mark as host to support cross builds (e.g. arm64-windows target on x64 host).
dependencies.name: directx-dxc

dependencies.$comment: Build-fix deps from CI (keep if actually used by your window/input layer; otherwise consider moving behind a feature).
dependencies.name: sdl2

dxc-runtime.description: Install DXC runtime library (dxcompiler). Disable/remove if you only need the dxc.exe tool at build time.

imgui-freetype.description: Enable ImGui FreeType font rasterization. This pulls in freetype (hosted on gitlab.freedesktop.org), which can be brittle on CI without asset caching.
